question: Kindly interpret this dream for me.
answer:
QUESTION
It was Thursday night when I slept and saw this dream where I am looking out of my home balcony facing the garden. And I see a rope that has been tied horizontally where one end meets the terrace and the other end is coming from somewhere beyond the house boundary. I see an elephant cross the rope, and then I see three black coloured animals one behind another also cross and indicate it to one of my relatives who also sees only the black animals. That's all i can remember. I have heard that seeing the rope in a dream holds some significance. Can you please interpret this for me. Jazakallah Khayr.
ANSWER


Share:
The rope symbolizes Islam. The elephant, foreigners and non-Muslims who are
crossing the boundaries of Islam and the animals are the allies of the
foreign invaders.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
